name: Create Zoho CRM contacts from Airtable records
description:
Use this template to automatically create a Zoho CRM contact when a new Airtable record is created.

In order for Make to be able to register new or updated records, your Airtable table needs to contain a field of type 'Created time' (to watch new records) or 'Last modified time' (updated records). Both Airtable fields are populated automatically.
